name: bdd-cheatsheet
description: Guidance for Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) patterns and Gherkin syntax in .NET. USE FOR: writing Gherkin feature files, structuring Given-When-Then scenarios, creating scenario outlines with data tables, organizing BDD step definitions, mapping business requirements to executable specifications with Reqnroll or SpecFlow. DO NOT USE FOR: unit test design (use xUnit/NUnit directly), performance testing, API contract testing (use Pact), or end-to-end browser automation (use Playwright).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
